text: @AynRandPaulRyan Dead on the 4th of July. Oh well. You reap what you sow. Covid19: Making America Great Again one ignorant Trump supporter at a time. I guess they will be giving that new job to the applicant that is alive and chose to wear a mask. Can’t cure stupid but you sure can kill it.
